text: Ani yasathi ki tya munaphika (dambhika) purusanna ani munaphika striyanna, ani murtipujaka purusanna va murtipujaka striyanna azaba (siksa) dyavi, je allahavisayi gairasamaja balagatata (vastutah) tyacyavaraca va'itapanace cakra ahe. Allaha tyancyavara naraja jhala ani tyane tyanna dhihkkarale ani tyancyasathi jahannama tayara keli ani te paratice mothe va'ita thikana ahe
